metadata.title: CVE-2024-24258 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: mupdf v1.23.9 was discovered to contain a memory leak via the menuEntryvariable in the glutAddSubMenu function.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
